front.title: Evidence Revocation and Status Protocol for Proof of Process

abstract.t: This document specifies mechanisms for revoking and updating Evidence status in the witnessd Proof of Process framework. It defines how authors can mark Evidence as superseded or revoked, how device key compromise is handled, and how Verifiers can efficiently check Evidence validity. The specification also defines an External Verifier Registry protocol that enables Relying Parties to discover trusted Verifiers and obtain federated verification services.
